{"id":399742705,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1600880861,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"48 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/399742705/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int len1 = nums1.size();\n        int len2 = nums2.size();\n        \n        if (len1 > len2) {\n            return findMedianSortedArrays(nums2, nums1);\n        }\n        \n        int l = 0, r = len1, m1 = 0, m2 = 0;\n        while (l <= r) {\n            m1 = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            m2 = (len1 + len2 + 1) / 2 - m1;\n            auto num1_1 = m1 > 0 ? nums1[m1 - 1] : INT_MIN;\n            auto num1_2 = m1 < len1 ? nums1[m1] : INT_MAX;\n            auto num2_1 = m2 > 0 ? nums2[m2 - 1] : INT_MIN;\n            auto num2_2 = m2 < len2 ? nums2[m2] : INT_MAX;\n            \n            if (num1_1 > num2_2) {\n                r = m1 - 1;\n            } else if (num1_2 < num2_1) {\n                l = m1 + 1;\n            } else {\n                // 那么则表示所有应该满足的条件都满足了\n                if ((len1 + len2) % 2 == 0) {\n                    return static_cast<double>(max(num1_1, num2_1) + min(num1_2, num2_2)) / 2.0;\n                } else {\n                    return static_cast<double>(max(num1_1, num2_1));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return 0.0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
